moves.13. Rxd8+ Kxd8 14. Kg2 Bd6 15. Re1 Ne7 1: 16.Nd5??.Computer gave this as 1.07 to black.Better 16.Bf4.I think white gives away his main plus:the K-side majority.In the Spanish Exchange if you remove all the pieces except the kings you can see its a won P ending to white because of the superior K side pawn structure with its mobile majority compared too blacks which with correct play by white should nt be able to get a passed P like white can.
moves.16... Nxd5 17. exd5 Re8 18. h3 Bf5 19. c: I think this is whites best practical chance
